extensions.task:
Displays the sub-projects of root project 'HelloDaemon'.

Task group: help

Assembles a bundle containing the library in debug.

Task group: other

Runs lint on the Debug build.

Task group: verification

Assembles a bundle containing the library in release.

Task group: other

Displays the configuration model of root project 'HelloDaemon'. [incubating]

Task group: help

Creates a version of android.jar that's suitable for unit tests.

Task group: build

Displays the tasks runnable from root project 'HelloDaemon' (some of the displayed tasks may belong to subprojects).

Task group: help

Initializes a new Gradle build. [incubating]

Task group: Build Setup

Runs all device checks using Device Providers and Test Servers.

Task group: verification

Displays all dependencies declared in root project 'HelloDaemon'.

Task group: help

Runs lint on all variants.

Task group: verification

Installs the 'archives' artifacts into the local Maven repository.

Task group: other

Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

Task group: build

Run unit tests for the release build.

Task group: verification

Deletes the build cache directory.

Task group: build

Displays the components produced by root project 'HelloDaemon'. [incubating]

Task group: help

Assembles all Debug builds.

Task group: build

Extracts Android annotations for the debug variant into the archive file

Task group: build

Uninstalls the Release build.

Task group: Install

Installs and runs instrumentation tests using all Device Providers.

Task group: verification

Uninstalls the android (on device) tests for the Debug build.

Task group: Install

Displays the insight into a specific dependency in root project 'HelloDaemon'.

Task group: help

Assembles all variants of all applications and secondary packages.

Task group: build

Displays a help message.

Task group: help

Installs the android (on device) tests for the Debug build.

Task group: Install

Runs all device checks on currently connected devices.

Task group: verification

Installs and runs the tests for debug on connected devices.

Task group: verification

Assembles all the Test applications.

Task group: build

Extracts Android annotations for the release variant into the archive file

Task group: build

Publishes artifacts to bintray.com.

Task group: publishing

Generates Gradle wrapper files. [incubating]

Task group: Build Setup

Displays the Android dependencies of the project.

Task group: Android

Run unit tests for all variants.

Task group: verification

Run unit tests for the debug build.

Task group: verification

Installs and runs instrumentation tests for all flavors on connected devices.

Task group: verification

Installs the Debug build.

Task group: Install

Generates IDEA project file (IPR)

Task group: other

Runs lint on the Release build.

Task group: verification

Assembles and tests this project and all projects that depend on it.

Task group: build

Generates IDEA project files (IML, IPR, IWS)

Task group: IDE

Displays the dependent components of components in root project 'HelloDaemon'. [incubating]

Task group: help

Displays all buildscript dependencies declared in root project 'HelloDaemon'.

Task group: help

Prints out all the source sets defined in this project.

Task group: Android

Generates IDEA module files (IML)

Task group: other

Cleans IDEA project files (IML, IPR)

Task group: IDE

Runs lint on just the fatal issues in the release build.

Task group: other

Generates an IDEA workspace file (IWS)

Task group: other

Uninstalls the Debug build.

Task group: Install

Displays the signing info for each variant.

Task group: Android

Assembles and tests this project.

Task group: build

Assembles all Release builds.

Task group: build

Displays the properties of root project 'HelloDaemon'.
